verses.verse: And the men<WH376> of Ephraim<WH669> were gathered together<WH6817>, and passed<WH5674> northward<WH6828>; and they said<WH559> unto Jephthah<WH3316>, Wherefore passedst thou over<WH5674> to fight<WH3898> against the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>, and didst not call<WH7121> us to go<WH3212> with thee<WH8313>? we will burn thy house<WH1004> upon thee with fire<WH784>.

And Jephthah<WH3316> said<WH559> unto them<WH5971>, I and my people were<WH1961> at great<WH3966> strife<WH376> with the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>; and when I called<WH2199> you<WH3467>, ye saved me not out of their hand<WH3027>.

And when I saw<WH7200> that ye saved<WH3467> me not<WH7760>, I put my life<WH5315> in my hand<WH3709>, and passed over<WH5674> against the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>, and Jehovah<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into my hand<WH3027>: wherefore then are ye come up<WH5927> unto me this day<WH3117>, to fight against me<WH3898>?

Then Jephthah<WH3316> gathered together<WH6908> all the men<WH582> of Gilead<WH1568>, and fought<WH3898> with Ephraim<WH669>; and the men<WH582> of Gilead<WH1568> smote<WH5221> Ephraim<WH669>, because they said<WH559>, Ye are fugitives<WH6412> of Ephraim<WH669>, ye Gileadites<WH1568>, in the midst<WH8432> of Ephraim<WH669>, and in the midst<WH8432> of Manasseh<WH4519>.

And the Gileadites<WH1568> took<WH3920> the fords<WH4569> of the Jordan<WH3383> against the Ephraimites<WH669>. And it was so<WH6412>, that, when any of the fugitives of Ephraim<WH669> said<WH559>, Let me go over<WH5674>, the men<WH582> of Gilead<WH1568> said<WH559> unto him<WH673>, Art thou an Ephraimite? If he said<WH559>, Nay;

then said<WH559> they unto him<WH559>, Say now Shibboleth<WH7641>; and he said<WH559> Sibboleth<WH5451>; for he could not frame<WH3559> to pronounce<WH1696> it right<WH3559>: then they laid<WH270> hold on him<WH7819>, and slew him at the fords<WH4569> of the Jordan<WH3383>. And there fell<WH5307> at that time<WH6256> of Ephraim<WH669> forty<WH705> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505>.

And Jephthah<WH3316> judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> six<WH8337> years<WH8141>. Then died<WH4191> Jephthah<WH3316> the Gileadite<WH1569>, and was buried<WH6912> in one of the cities<WH5892> of Gilead<WH1568>.
And after<WH310> him Ibzan<WH78> of Beth-lehem<WH1035> judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478>.

And he had thirty<WH7970> sons<WH1121>; and thirty<WH7970> daughters<WH1323> he sent<WH7971> abroad<WH2351>, and thirty<WH7970> daughters<WH1323> he brought<WH935> in from abroad<WH2351> for his sons<WH1121>. And he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>.
And Ibzan<WH78> died<WH4191>, and was buried<WH6912> at Beth-lehem<WH1035>.
And after<WH310> him Elon<WH356> the Zebulunite<WH2075> judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478>; and he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> ten<WH6235> years<WH8141>.
And Elon<WH356> the Zebulunite<WH2075> died<WH4191>, and was buried<WH6912> in Aijalon<WH357> in the land<WH776> of Zebulun<WH2074>.
And after<WH310> him Abdon<WH5658> the son<WH1121> of Hillel<WH1985> the Pirathonite<WH6553> judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478>.

And he had forty<WH705> sons<WH1121> and thirty<WH7970> sons<WH1121>' sons, that rode<WH7392> on threescore and ten<WH7657> ass colts<WH5895>: and he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> eight<WH8083> years<WH8141>.

And Abdon<WH5658> the son<WH1121> of Hillel<WH1985> the Pirathonite<WH6553> died<WH4191>, and was buried<WH6912> in Pirathon<WH6552> in the land<WH776> of Ephraim<WH669>, in the hill-country<WH2022> of the Amalekites<WH6003>.
